Title: Shader To Human (S2H) Features
Description: Examples of all the features in Shader To Human (S2H). S2H is a tool that helps you with shader writing and debugging. It's meant to be used for small specific use cases (printing or drawing a few number, 2D or 3D elements) as it was optimized for ease of integration (~ one file, few lines of code).
Author: Martin Mittring, Anushka Nair
